Text:
"This live programme follows the run-up to the ceremony..."

This is NOT the Opening Ceremony then, it is the program that preceded it on the BBC. VERY misleading title.

@ drymoused

It IS the opening ceremony.  Stop confusing people.
At 4 hours long, this IS the opening.

Alright thanks for clarifying that.

For a moment a thought what drymoused was saying was true.
Dibya: Could you up a 1080p version of this?  I know someone who was in the opening ceremonies and want the highest res version possible to see if I can spot them :]
Can someone tell me how to download this? I have utorrent... and everytime i click the magnet (am logged in) it shows a blank folder w nothing to download in utorrent....bit torrent was the same....
With a handle like UAofE, how can he not be a dumbass!

Yes this is the BBC 2 Sports Channel version and unlike Eurosport (who used a MICROPHONE to connect viewers to the stadium sound!) has very good audio.   It is quite a show with reference to the UK's past and future and the stage effects and music are nothing short of World Class.   Way to GO BBC!  Thank you seeder :-)
